Colossus Docs


Colossus is a speedier, more lightweight Express JS alternative.

View the Project on GitHub ProjectColossus/Colossus

This project is maintained by ProjectColossus

Docs written by Monotrix

#How to install Colossus

First, install npm (or yarn).
Then, follow the instructions below depending on your package manager of choice:
NPM

  • Go to the directory in which you’d like to install Colossus
  • Run npm i @projectcolossus/colossus

Yarn

  • Go to the directory in which you’d like to install Colossus
  • Run yarn add @projectcolossus/colossus

Then, return to the home page to learn how to use Colossus!
